episodes.title: Convicted sex cult leader Larry Ray speaks from behind bars - Crime Files  | News 12
episodes.description:
News 12's Senior Reporter Tara Rosenblum spoke in depth with Lawrence Ray, the so-called Sarah Lawrence sex cult leader who moved into his daughter's dorm and abused her roommates and friends. 

The conversations with Ray, who is speaking from behind bars, are the first interviews since Ray was sentenced to prison for sex trafficking, extortion, and conspiracy, among other charges.

Find out the whole story in the Crime Files true crime documentary "Sex, Lies & Terror: The Larry Ray Tapes."

Check out News 12 New York’s “Date Night: Crime Files Marathon” every night this Valentine’s Day weekend starting at 7 p.m.

Convicted sex cult leader Larry Ray speaks from behind bars - Crime Files  | News 12

episodes.title: Sex, Lies & Terror: The Larry Ray Tapes | News 12
episodes.description:
News 12's Senior Reporter Tara Rosenblum delves into the mind of Lawrence Ray, the so-called Sarah Lawrence sex cult leader who moved into his daughter's dorm and abused her roommates and friends. 

News 12's explosive new Crime Files special, 'Sex, Lies & Terror: The Larry Ray Tapes,' features the first interviews with Ray since he was sentenced to 60 years in prison for sex trafficking, extortion, and conspiracy, among other charges.

episodes.title: Man convicted of exploiting daughter's Sarah Lawrence peers
episodes.description: Lawrence Ray, 62, was convicted on all counts following a Manhattan trial where jurors heard weeks of testimony from witnesses who described his psychologically manipulative relationship with young people he first met at Sarah Lawrence College.
